name: Dark Claw
text: If this card is attached to a Darkness Pokémon, each of the attacks of that Pokémon does 20 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

text: Attach a basic Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Darkness Pokémon.

name: Enhanced Hammer
text: Discard a Special Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Hooligans Jim & Cas
text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 3 random cards from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals those cards and shuffles them into his or her deck.

name: N
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws a card for each of his or her remaining Prize cards.

name: Old Amber Aerodactyl
text: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Aerodactyl you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Professor Juniper
text: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.

name: Random Receiver
text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Supporter card. Put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Rare Candy
text: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.

name: Twist Mountain
text: Once during each player's turn, that player may flip a coin. If heads, the player puts a Restored Pokémon from his or her hand onto his or her Bench.

name: Ultra Ball
text: Discard 2 cards from your hand. (If you can't discard 2 cards, you can't play this card.) Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
